Articles.Content:
i made a vf-1j from the robotech serie's

it can go from flight mode to guardian mode.

i also wanted battloid/robot mode but thats just to many parts that move and you then cant fly any more.

the plane is 179 part big

when you land do it slow! you can use the feet for airbrake's.

and very important, use asas (you cant fly or transform with out it)

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

video

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

toggle's:

1 engine's

2 ladder

for the transformation i use the Infernal Robotics menu

_____________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________________

http://kerbal.curseforge.com/ksp-mods...

http://www.curse.com/ksp-mods/kerbal/...

http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...GatlingGun-mod

You win the price!!!!!.

It can fly and it can transforms, on the ground and mid flight
